name: Decibel Blue
description: Decibel Blue is a full-service creative marketing and public relations agency that has developed a proprietary system to help clients Sound Loud®. This approach molds strategy and imagination into fresh ideas focused on growth and a high return on investment.  Founded in 2005, the company has offices in Phoenix and Denver. A member of PR Boutiques International, Decibel Blue specializes in retail, health or wellness, restaurants and real estate.
